conclusion: The working principle of the electromagnetic railgun involves a projectile moving freely between two parallel rails, maintaining good contact with the rails, and being propelled by the Lorentz force.
Xiao Ming purchased a railgun model with a rail length of 0.5 m, a parallel rail spacing of 0.02 m, a projectile mass of 0.02 kg, a rail current of 10 A, and a magnetic field strength of 1 T.
The Lorentz force F acting on the projectile is 5 N.
The acceleration a of the projectile is 250 m/s^2.
The final velocity v of the projectile is approximately 15.81 m/s.
The kinetic energy K of the projectile is 2.5 J.
The time t taken for the projectile to travel the length of the rails is approximately 0.0632 s.
The power P of the electromagnetic railgun when the projectile is launched is approximately 39.56 W.
